lead_paragraph: Despite two bogeys on the final three holes, Paula Creamer shot an even-par 71 and was the only player still under par at the SemGroup Championship in Broken Arrow, Okla. She had a one-shot lead over Ji Young Oh.
snippet: Despite two bogeys on the final three holes, Paula Creamer shot an even-par 71 and was the only player still under par at the SemGroup Championship in Broken Arrow, Okla. She had a one-shot lead over Ji Young Oh.
